title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the Rams overcoming a 10 point 4th quarter deficit to advance to the Super Bowl and how Matthew Stafford spent years preparing for the biggest opportunity of his career. He points out the flaws in Patrick Mahomes' game that other media members are afraid to acknowledge. He tells you why he was right about Joe Burrow and wrong about Odell Beckham Jr. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Greg Olsen joins the show to talk about Stafford's rise to success after leaving the Lions for the Rams after 12 seasons in Detroit.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
